about_the_game:
Yes, it's the apocalypse, so pick one.

Wooden rusty stone axe
Awesome looking Scavenger axe

Said enough, right?

Grab this free DLC while you can. If you are a proud (or maybe not too proud, who knows?) owner of One Last Day you can add this DLC for free, just for a limited time!

This is a free limited product containing two weapons with unique skins for One Last Day, you need the base game to get this item. This DLC will remain free until the base game is out of alpha stage.

One Last Day is a survival sandbox game set in a apocalyptic, living world where you need to survive and improve your own character. This game is currently in alpha stage and it's getting big changes and additions.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.5 or greater
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.0GHz or greater
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6750M (512 MB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You may be able to run the game with less RAM by lowering graphic settings
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.5 or greater
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0GHz or greater
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M380 (2 GB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
